strs

This package provides string functions that are analogous to those used by Python’s str class. All functions use stringi, so this package is mostly a convenience wrapper for anyone regularly switching between Python and R.

Install

The package isn’t on CRAN, but you can install it using remotes.

remotes::install_github("pythonicr/strs")
